Package com.example.mdbook

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PatientAdapter.OnItemClickListener
    Listens for clicks then notifies OnitemsClicks with the position so when the recycler view is clicked, click the card view too
    ProblemAdapter.OnItemClickListener
    Listens for clicks then notifies OnitemsClicks with the position so when the recycler view is clicked, click the card view too
    RecordAdapter.onItemClickListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddCommentActivity
    Creates an activity where the caregiver and patient are able to add comment record to problems.
    AddPatientActivity
    Creates an activity for the user to add patients Displays a list of all the patients already added
    AddProblemActivity
    Creates an activity for the user to add a problem Displays a list of all the problems already added
    AddProblemActivity.DatePickerFragment
    A static fragment class required for proper DatePicker implementation
    AddRecordActivity
    Creates an activity for the user to add a record Displays a list of all the problems already added
    AddRecordActivityTest  
    AddReminderActivity
    Creates an activity for the user to add a reminder Displays a timepicker, uses AlarmService class
    AlarmService
    Required for proper reminder functionality.
    DataManager
    Provides a cache between UserManager, LocalStorageController and ElasticsearchController for the data of the currently logged in user and a queue of offline changes made waiting to be uploaded.
    EditAccountDetailActivity
    Creates an activity for the user to edit their Account Details
    EditProblemDetailsActivity
    Creates a view for editing the problems details
    ElasticSearchTools
    Provides a suite of tools to Manage Elasticsearch cloud data.
    GenerateQRActivity  
    ImageAdapter
    Lets the user have a slideshow
    LaunchActivityTest  
    ListPatientActivity
    Creates an activity that list all the patients for the Caregiver
    ListPatientProblemActivity
    Creates an activity that lists the Patients Problems for the care giver.
    ListProblemActivity
    Activity for displaying the users problems when logging in.
    ListRecordActivity
    Activity which lists the records for a certain problem, viewed by the Patient
    ListRecordsCGActivity
    Activity which shows the caregiver the number of records a patient has for a particular patient uses RecordCGAdapter.
    LoginActivity
    Logs in user, if user exists.
    LoginActivityTest  
    MapActivity
    MapActivity for users for geolocation implementation
    NewBodyLocationView
    Creates an activity that add/view a body location
    NotificationActivity  
    OptionsMenuActivity
    Creates activity that shows user things they can do when clicked on a particular proble,
    PatientAdapter
    Creates an activity for the user to add patients Displays a list of all the patients already added
    PatientAdapter.PatientAdapterHolder
    Creates the Adapter to hold the card view in the recycler view
    PatientSearchActivity
    Creates an activity for the user to view to search their problems
    PatientSlideActivity
    Lets the user have a slideshow
    ProblemAdapter
    Custom adapter to add card views into a recycler view.
    ProblemAdapter.ProblemAdapterHolder
    Creates the Adapter to hold the card view in the recycler view
    ProblemTest
    Tests the problem objects
    RecordAdapter
    Record Adapter for viewing records in ListRecordActivity for the patient
    RecordAdapter.RecordViewholder
    A static class which is for a particular view, which contains the contents of record.
    RecordCGAdapter
    Record Adapter for viewing records in ListRecordCGActivity for the caregiver
    RecordCGAdapter.RecordCGViewholder
    A static class which is for a particular view, which contains the contents of record.
    RecordTest
    tests record objects and by extension, photo, location and problem containment
    RegisterActivity
    Creates an activity for the user to register their account
    ScanQRActivity  
    SearchController  
    SearchControllerTest  
    User
    Holds contact information relevant to a user.
    UserDecomposer
    Tools for converting user objects to and from JSONObjects.
    UserDecomposer.Decomposition
    Equivalent of a User object, but with its components converted to JSONObjects and grouped into HashMaps based on their types.
    UserManager
    Provides a singleton interface for managing users, user data and user login / logout.
    UserManagerTest
    test functionalities of usermanager and elastisearch controller.
    UserTest
    test functionalities of user class and controller
    ViewAccountDetailActivity
    Creates an activity for the user to view their Account Details
    ViewMapActivity
    Allows user to see the map
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NoSuchUserException
    An exception to be thrown when an operation is made on a user that doesn't exist.
    UserIDNotAvailableException
    An exception to be thrown when requesting to create and account with a UserID that is already taken.
